content: As a man who grew up in the presence of my mother, father, younger sister, grandmother, aunts, cousins and a good distribution of female and male relatives, I am often surprised and dismayed at the offensive attitudes we portray towards the fairer sex. We need to face this issue squarely and make the necessary changes, even if they hurt us or are uncomfortable for us. Thanks for reminding us of these inane attitudes and I join you in pushing for change, Olayemi.
